Don't need lots of external link subheadings cluttering up the TOC
As an anthropologist, this statement makes me shudder. Genocide is NOT a usual practice in the history of ethnic conflict. It is not present in every situation -- it is an event that is unique.
There is a section "Genocide in history" there is no need to litter the article with more links to the same article
